name: web4-littlelink
description: Self-hosted Linktree alternative to use with web4

scripts.deploy:website: npm run build:website && npx web4-deploy dist/ $CONTRACT_NAME
scripts.deploy: npm run build:contract && npm run deploy:contract
scripts.prestart: npm run build:contract:debug && npm run dev:deploy:contract
scripts.test: npm run build:contract:debug && node contract/test && jest test --runInBand
